name: Tow Defense
description:
Another day, another job to clean space. But maybe not this time, something is not quite right! You are a space cleaner and you have ship with tow ray attached. You can grab any object and tow it. Use anything what can save your life!

It`s my first Game Jam entry and first "finished" game ever. Had a lot of fun making it. Used a lot of free assets because I spent too much time learning everything.

  • Buskerdroid - Blast https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Buskerdroid/Gameboy_Love_Ep
  • Screamingbrain – seamless space backgrounds https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-space-backgrounds
  • Kenney - Sci-Fi Sounds https://kenney.nl/assets/sci-fi-sounds
  • Zintoki - Space Breaker https://zintoki.itch.io/space-breaker
